info.gloss: to pull, draw out, attract; to stretch

words: to draw (e.g. a bow); to pull; to stretch sth; to extend; to lengthen; to involve or implicate in; to attract; to lead; to guide; to leave; to provide evidence or justification for; old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhàng], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to guide; to lead (around); to conduct; to boot; introduction; primer
to give rise to; to lead to; to cause; to arouse
to lead to; to trigger; to initiate; to cause; to evoke (emotions)
lit. to quote the classics; to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
to crane one's neck; to await eagerly; to lead; to show the way
to draw into; to pull into; to introduce
to quote; to cite; to recommend; to appoint; (computing) reference
to coerce (sb into doing sth bad); to lure (into a trap); to seduce
to guide; to show; to point (the way); directions; guidance; guidelines

attractive force (such as gravitation); sex appeal; attractiveness
to quote; to cite; to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
to pull; to draw (a cart); to tow
